definitions: constituting number seven in a sequence; 7th

examples.text: his seventh goal of the season
he was the seventh of eight children

definitions: each of seven equal parts into which something is or may be divided.
shortDefinitions: each of seven equal parts into which something is or may be divided

definitions: the seventh finisher or position in a race or competition

examples.text: he finished seventh in the tournament

shortDefinitions: seventh finisher or position in race or competition

definitions: seventhly (used to introduce a seventh point or reason).
an interval spanning seven consecutive notes in a diatonic scale.
shortDefinitions: interval spanning seven consecutive notes in diatonic scale

definitions: the note which is higher by a seventh than the tonic of a diatonic scale or root of a chord.
shortDefinitions: note that is higher by this interval than tonic of diatonic scale or root of chord

definitions: a chord in which the seventh note of the scale forms an important component.
shortDefinitions: chord in which seventh note of scale forms important component
